words.hint: A woody plant with a single stem or trunk.
A written or printed work consisting of pages.
The natural satellite of the Earth.
A fruit that is often red or green.
A large natural stream of water flowing in a channel.
A stringed musical instrument played with fingers or a pick.
A game or problem designed to test ingenuity or knowledge.
A celestial body moving in an orbit around a star.
A device used to capture photographs or videos.
Relating to the smallest discrete quantity of energy.
A set of rules for solving a problem in a finite number of steps.
A tube containing mirrors and loose, colored objects.
A transformation, such as a caterpillar becoming a butterfly.
A musical instrument with wooden bars struck by mallets.
